snippet.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2 - Heavy Cargo Pack DLC
snippet.description:
Expand the cargo range in Euro Truck Simulator 2 by eight new optional Heavy Haul cargoes: Asphalt Miller, Industrial Cable Reel, Concrete Beams, Dozer Crawl, Locomotive, Metal Centering, Mobile Crane, and Transformer.

Take advantage of new trailers - Single Extendable Flatbed and Semi Lowloader with Drop Deck - coming with steerable axles for safer navigation around tight bends.

With the new DLC, we are also expanding the range of available truck chassis options for several models to include 8x4 heavy haul trucks 

Available now on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/531131/

IMPORTANT NOTE: Due to the technical reasons, we're changing/ alternating some content of said DLC - and videos need be adjusted (and reuploaded) to correspond with those changes.

Stock Media provided by lynnepublishing / Pond5
